a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of new cars sold that are battery-electric and plug-in hybrid,
Plug-in hybrids cars can run using an electric motor and rechargeable battery, or an internal combustion engine. Their
battery is usually smaller than a fully battery-electric.
Data source: International Energy Agency. Global EV Outlook 2024.
